tutorials.title: Getting Started with Python
tutorials.content: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its simplicity and readability. It's widely used in web development, data science, automation, and AI.

tutorials.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
tutorials.content: JavaScript is a versatile programming language that runs in web browsers and on servers via Node.js. It's essential for modern web development and full-stack applications.

tutorials.title: Introduction to React
tutorials.content: React is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It uses a component-based architecture and virtual DOM for efficient rendering.

concepts.variables: Variables store data values. In most programming languages, you declare variables with keywords like var, let, or const.
concepts.functions: Functions are reusable blocks of code that perform specific tasks. They help organize code and avoid repetition.
concepts.loops: Loops execute code repeatedly based on conditions. Common types include for loops, while loops, and forEach methods.
